consequence.title: The Consequence
consequence.intro: Conventional headache relief is entirely pharmaceutical-based, creating a host of potential negative side effects.

bullets.title: Short-term effects
bullets.text: drowsiness, nausea, dizziness, and digestive issues

bullets.title: Long-term effects
bullets.text: liver damage, kidney problems, gastrointestinal bleeding, and cardiovascular risks

bullets.title: Addiction potential
bullets.text: dependency cycles that are difficult to break
